snippet: Safety measures have been proposed, and state and federal officials should help finance those improvements.
abstract: Editorial welcomes announcement by federal officials of full review of the safety culture of the Metro-North system, in response to deadly Dec 1 derailment of a Metro-North train; calls on New York Sen Charles Schumer and Connecticut Sen Richard Blumenthal to help find financing for much-needed safety reforms that the Metropolitan Transportation Authority has deemed too costly.
lead_paragraph: Safety measures have been proposed, and state and federal officials should help finance those improvements.
